class.name: ProcedureDescriptionFormatEntity
class.comment: Table to store the ProcedureDescriptionFormat information of procedures. Mapping file: mapping/core/ProcedureDescriptionFormat.hbm.xml

column.name: id
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: format
column.comment: The procedureDescriptionFormat value, e.g. http://www.opengis.net/sensorML/1.0.1 for procedures descriptions as specified in OGC SensorML 1.0.1
